name: vlayer-web-proof
description: High-performance web proof generation using TLS Notarization (TLSN) technology with native Rust bindings for maximum efficiency.

scripts.build: bun run build:rust && bun run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && bun run copy:native
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json --resolveJsonModule false && npm run fix-esm-imports
scripts.dev: bun run build && bun run dist/index.js
scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration && npm pack && npm run rename:tgz && bun run test:package
scripts.test:package: cd tests/package-tests && bun run test && cd ../../
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run test
